title: What are the actual benefits of wireless charging? - Quora

response.answer_text: How does Wireless Charging works? Well, simple answer might be this: It uses a electromagnetic field in one device to induce electric current inside the another device metal coil. Now that current inside metal coil charges your battery. Benefits of Wireless charging: You already mentioned the first and common benefit that is to get rid of wires!Some phones are waterproof and they had covers at charging port, so connecting chargers is not only difficult but it also messes up with the ports and eventually get broken. Hence, Wireless charging comes handy here.It helps the environment to be simple and greener as it avoids cables that is manufactured at high rate and plastic that is being disposed/burned to recycle can harm us.The phones USB port won’t wear out easily.This is only the advantages I can think of right now!
